author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves quarantining files based on their format to prevent the execution of potentially harmful files. Quarantining files by format is a containment measure that helps mitigate risks associated with file-based threats, such as malware or ransomware. This can be implemented through security solutions that automatically detect and isolate files with specific formats deemed suspicious or unsafe, allowing for further analysis or safe handling.

requirements.description: Authority and access permissions to implement containment measures.
Technical capability and tools to execute containment actions effectively.
Procedures to validate containment effectiveness and monitor for bypass attempts.
File system access and forensic tools for file analysis and manipulation.

title: Quarantine File by Format

references.name: SANS: Network Isolation and Quarantine Procedures
NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Computer Security Incident Handling Guide
CISA: Defense in Depth - Network Segmentation and Isolation
